products.title: Vermont Metropolitan Grey Mist & Dusk Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.metadescription: Just what a modern interior is crying out for, this vermont metropolitan grey mist & dusk wooden blind offers natural beauty and crisp style all in one package. The grey tinted wooden slats, 100% basswood and warp-resistant, bring a comfortingly organic feel to a space.
products.productdescription: Just what a modern interior is crying out for, this vermont metropolitan grey mist & dusk wooden blind offers natural beauty and crisp style all in one package. The grey tinted wooden slats, 100% basswood and warp-resistant, bring a comfortingly organic feel to a space.
